name: Fish Kebab
description:
Help a cyborg combat veteran swordfish in achieving his lifelong dream: becoming a food service worker and impressing people from all over the world with excellent cuisine. 

Swim around the depths and collect the ingredients that the ocean is graciously providing for you by sticking them onto your nose. But beware: the customers demand perfection and speed! Wrong ingredients, sticking them in the wrong order, or taking too long for an order can drive customers away. 

Be the best damn food service worker the ocean has ever seen and make Swordfish Sam's dreams come true!
